thread.title: Ground News - Stolen ashes of late husband returned to grateful Pembroke Pines woman
thread.title_full: Ground News - Stolen ashes of late husband returned to grateful Pembroke Pines woman

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Stolen ashes of late husband returned to grateful Pembroke Pines woman
text:
Summary by Ground News Maria Araya's late husband Juan Araya passed away nine years ago. His ashes were stolen from her Pembroke Pines home earlier this week along with a safe. City workers located the memorial lockbox down the road from her home and returned it to her. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
WPLG Center High Factuality Individual: Howard Buffett Stolen ashes of late husband returned to grateful Pembroke Pines woman A South Florida woman is feeling joy and relief after her late husbands ashes have been returned.They were stolen from her Pembroke Pines home earlier this week along with a safe.Now, Maria Araya said she is able to sleep in peace.“I feel so happy, I can’t believe it,” she said. “It’s like a miracle that he’s back to me again.”On Wednesday, Local 10 News reported on the crooks who broken into Arya’s home.They cut through the screen of her back p…
